name: Proxima Centauri b (LD38)
description:
Ludum Dare 38 Entry

Controls:

  • Use cursors to control the Explorer unit.
  • Use the mouse to place buildings and interact with the UI.

Build, Explore, Survive!

(There are balancing issues, bugs, and the cube is not working 100%)

Made with phaser and css 3d for the cube.

Credits:

  • Programming, Design, Art - Goncalo Monteiro (https://twitter.com/ErtaiGM)
  • Music and Sound FX - Pedro Matos aka jumperror (https://soundcloud.com/jumperror) (https://twitter.com/jumperrormusic)
